description: Container for schedules and routes of transportation lines
title: SchedulesAndRoutes

___lineTypeNames.description: Names of all transit lines. The order is important because lines are represented by an index of its name in this array further

___texts.description: Container for all texts that exist in legends of schedules
___texts.title: Texts

___streets.description: Names of streets. The order is important because further a street is represented by an index of its name in this array

items.description: Information of all departures in the specified hour
Information about the departure in specified hour and minute

___lowFloor.description: Indicates if the vehicle has a low floor or not

___symbols.description: List of additional symbols for this departure. Symbol is represented by a number that is an index of element in SchedulesAndRoutes->texts->legendTexts array
